english.segment1: You want some of this?. Some of me, some of you. You want some of this. Yeah Yeah I'll bet you do
english.segment2: How are you supposed to know. When you're talking numbers. If you would only let it go. Maybe you could lose your #'s
english.segment3: It may be way too late. But not for too much longer. You wanted some of this. But you're so far from done.
english.segment4: How are you supposed to know. When you're fooling everyone. If you would only let it go. Maybe you could lose your #'s
english.segment5: How are you supposed to know (x4)
